name: Tutor
description:
Collaborated with students to complete homework assignments,
identify lagging skills and correct weaknesses
Planned lessons for allotted time to about 15 tutees to strengthen weak subjects and build skills
Taught and assisted students in areas such as Linear Algebra, Physics and Chemistry
Created tailored lesson plans and study guides

name: Intern
description: Internship which focused on an area of neuroscence: DTI (Diffusion tensor imaging)
Involved using shell and python scripts for image processing
Produced weekly presentations on project progress

name: Teacher Assistant in Computer Science
description: Assisted teachers in providing TA sessions, correcting assignments as well as providing availabilities for students
Involved courses relate to topics such as Computer Architecture, General Programming, Data Structures, Programming Language Design, System Administration

name: Technology Analyst Intern
description: Joined the Information Management Team and developed a Java Spring project
Learned and familiarized with many development tools such as the Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Jenkins, custom devops tools, etc...

name: Technology Analyst
description: Joined the Information Management Team as a permanent position
Took part in the Technology Analyst Program offered by Morgan Stanley to train new employees
